transcript.text: At Johnson Controls we expect all our employees to understand how trade impacts their associated duties and responsibilities, and ensure compliance.

contentBackground.img: Employee consulting with the corporate trade compliance office

panelText.text: You are responsible for understanding how trade regulations impact your role and to ensure compliance with them. If you are unsure, you should ask an expert.
Our company has trade experts ready to assist you ensure compliance.

You can consult:
  • your local Trade Manager or Trade Coordinator
  • the Regional or Global Trade Manager
  • the Business Unit Trade Director
  • the Corporate Trade Compliance Office

instructionText.text: Click on Next (bottom right arrow) to return to the Home menu.
